features: ✅Powerful and Continuous Steam for Effortless Wrinkle Removal Experience the convenience of our 1000W steam iron, a portable iron steamer designed to cater to all your ironing needs. With powerful and continuous steam, this mini steam iron effortlessly removes wrinkles from your clothes, leaving them fresh and perfectly pressed. Enjoy the convenience of a quick heat-up time of just 15 seconds, so you can start ironing in no time.

✅4-in-1 Multi-Function Handheld Steamer and Iron Our versatile ironing machine offers four different functions to suit your ironing preferences and adapt to various fabrics and garments. Choose between upright and flat ironing, providing flexibility for different types of clothing. Additionally, switch between generating steam or using it as a dry iron, allowing you to customize your ironing experience. This 4-in-1 multi-functionality makes it perfect for daily use at home, while traveling,

✅Compact, Lightweight, and Travel-Friendly Design Designed with portability in mind, our mini iron for clothes is incredibly small and compact, measuring only 20*12*13.5CM in size and weighing just 0.86kg. Its compact form factor makes it easy to carry and store, perfect for travelers and individuals with limited space. Despite its small size, the ergonomic "handle" can be folded at 180°,

✅Additional Travel Essentials Included We've thoughtfully included a travel bag and a plastic measuring cup with our mini iron steamer for added convenience and protection. The travel bag ensures safe storage and portability, protecting your iron during transportation. The plastic measuring cup allows for precise water filling, ensuring optimal steam performance.

✅Easy to Use with Leak-Proof Design for Hassle-Free Ironing Our mini steam iron is designed for ease of use. Simply plug in the iron and wait for just 10 seconds until it heats up and is ready to use. The user-friendly controls allow you to effortlessly select the desired steamer or dry iron mode, depending on your ironing needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe and Reliable
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mini steam iron recently, and I am impressed with its safety and reliability features. The anti-dry burn protection and automatic shut-off functions give me peace of mind while using it. The handle is ergonomic and can rotate 180 degrees, making it comfortable and easy to use in any position. The high-quality heating element heats up quickly and maintains a constant temperature, ensuring perfect ironing results every time. The cowhide texture not only adds style but also makes it durable. I highly recommend this mini steam iron for its safety and reliability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works, but small capacity
reviews.reviewText: This portable steam iron was a surprising treat. My husband wears button-up shirts for his office job, and they’re often wrinkled when freed from the laundry cycle. I read in other reviews on this product that it could be used to steam wrinkles out of shirts that were still hanging.What? You can steam wrinkles out of shirts while they are hanging? You can skip the ironing board!?I loathe the ironing board, so you can imagine what that bit of knowledge did to my brain. A choir of angels rejoiced. The world suddenly seemed brighter, and my shoulders felt lighter.Anyway, I ordered this little hand held steamer a quick moment later, eagerly anticipated its arrival, and tested it out today. It works! I’m not going to claim that steaming the shirts while they hung was as crisp an outcome as ironing them on an ironing board, but the improvement is substantial, and given my antipathy towards the ironing board, my husband can deal with the imperfections while he’s relying on me to do the work.I did run out of literal steam quickly with the hand held steamer, unfortunately, and I do not look forward to refilling it frequently when going through shirts, but this is still a delightful improvement over our previous situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just loved it. It works great better than a professional one I have at home. It doesn't take too long to release the steam and we are able to use in multiple items before having to fill it up again. The only down side is that I think it's heavy. We had to bring it on our carry on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is awful it doesn’t work ..I didn’t try until today my fault didn’t check it.. it doesn’t even steam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for a Backup Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I was wondering what to expect since this product is labeled as multi-functional. It has a nice carrying/storage bag and water/measuring cup. There is also a holding/hot plate to rest on. Although it's a bit heavier than I expected, it's still easy to use.I read the instructions FIRST, and I recommend you do too. They provide detailed information throughout, but they are pretty straightforward.Here's my experience with it:The dry function, as an iron, was relatively cool, requiring more effort to use on something like cotton. This function is not the best quality.For the steam function, my unit did best in the flat position. It definitely had more steam power in that position, and the unit is not any noisier than any other steam iron. When I was done using it, I put it on the rest plate and moved the knob to the dry position. I never had any issues with it leaking. I did test it on an old towel first, as the instructions indicated, but I didn't have any problems with leaking or other issues.The instructions did not mention that when using it as a steamer in the upright position, it works best and has the highest output of steam when the nose of the unit is pointing up. In other words, the unit length is perpendicular to the floor. I did not get much, if any, steam out of it if I had the unit parallel to the floor. This unit is best used as a steamer rather than an iron, and even with that, it is fair to good at best.I have learned that having a backup iron is good if the primary one stops working. I will keep this for that reason, but I would not buy it for that purpose. This would do if I need a steamer in a pinch, but purchasing an actual steamer may be the best option if that's what you're looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Small and can use on hanging clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for infrequent use and small jobs
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This mini iron comes with a drawstring carrying bag, a plastic pour cup for water, and a heat safe plate to rest it on. I don’t do very much ironing and didn’t want to commit to a full size iron and ironing board as I live in a small apartment. I mainly use my dryer to get rid of wrinkles but I wanted something for the more stubborn wrinkle prone clothing items and for flattening cotton paper for artwork. This mini iron is the perfect solution. Everything fits in the draw string bag and takes up little room, it heats up quickly and works well. I had a small issue with it dripping water when on the steam mode, but I’ve had that experience with other irons as well. The water capacity is very small, so it would be difficult to use this on multiple items on the steam mode without having to refill it. However, for someone who intends to use it rarely and for small jobs, it’s a good alternative to a full size ironing set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item is well-made, has a good weight, and is easy to handle with one hand. It has a smooth handle and works well on flannel shirts. Filling the water reservoir is simple, it heats up quickly, and produces enough steam to remove wrinkles. However, the dry function is not very effective, especially on cotton, and requires more effort. The steam function works best when the iron is flat, producing more steam power. It can be placed on the rest plate without any leaks. Overall, it is better suited for steaming than ironing, but its performance is only average to good. Consider purchasing an actual steamer if you want a dedicated steamer.
